author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Godrej Agrovet Acquires Stake In Maxximilk Pvt Ltd (Jan 18)
text:
(Corrects bullet to “less than 50 pct” stake from “51 pct”)
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Godrej Agrovet Ltd:
* ACQUIRED LESS THAN 50 PERCENT OF TOTAL PAID-UP EQUITY SHARE CAPITAL OF MAXXIMILK PRIVATE LIMITED BY WAY OF PREFERENTIAL ISSUE Source text: bit.ly/2G910Mo Further company coverage:
